C

calculateTotal() - Method in class assignment.OrderFile
calculateTotal() calculates the total by using the prices of each individual items.
checkAllAvailability() - Method in class assignment.Restaurant
Checks which all tables are free, and available to be reserved.
checkAllReservations(ReservationFile) - Static method in class assignment.Application
Checks which tables are available and can be booked by a customer.
checkAvailability(int) - Method in class assignment.Restaurant
Checks whether tables are available, given a specific table size, and returns the number of seats available.
checkReservation(ReservationFile, int) - Static method in class assignment.Application
Checks which tables are available and can be booked by a customer, depending on the size.
checkStaff() - Method in class assignment.OrderFile
checkStaff() checks whether the person taking a order is a waiter or not.
clearDessert(int) - Method in class assignment.Application
clearDessert() clears the content of Desserts text file, so that modified data can be rewritten if any menu item is removed or edited.
clearDrink(int) - Method in class assignment.Application
clearDrink() clears the content of Drinks text file, so that modified data can be rewritten if any menu item is removed or edited.
clearMainCourse(int) - Method in class assignment.Application
clearMainCourse() clears the content of Main Course Items text file, so that modified data can be rewritten if any menu item is removed or edited.
clearReservation() - Static method in class assignment.Application
clearReservation() clears the content of the Reservation file, so that modified data can be rewritten while canceling reservations.
clearSetPackage(int) - Method in class assignment.Application
clearSetPackage() clears the content of Packages text file, so that modified data can be rewritten if any menu item is removed or edited.
createOrder(boolean) - Method in class assignment.OrderFile
createOrder() displays the items that can be ordered and lets the user select a category to order from.
createReportStructure() - Method in class assignment.SalesReport
createReportStructure() loads matrix (array of object of class SalesStructure) with all the names of all the menu items, one by one.
